title: 111_s394
content: Art and Collectibles Capital Gains Tax Treatment Parity Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) eliminate the 28 capital gains tax rate for collectibles, thus allowing gain from the sale of collectibles to be taxed at the 15 tax rate applicable to other investment property. And (2) allow the creator of a literary, musical, artistic, or scholarly property a fair market value tax deduction for the donation of such property to a tax-exempt organization, if properly appraised and donated no sooner than 18 months after its creation.
